psa_list.title: Choose Your Video Challenge
psa_list.guide: You need to enable MediaRecorder on your device. Here's a video that guides you through it.

video_recorder.play_prompt: Hit the play button and read out what you see on the screen.
video_recorder.process_prompt: Are you happy with your video challenge?
video_recorder.re_record_prompt: Think you can do a better job?

home.title: Recorded videos
home.del_prompt: Are you sure you want to delete this video?

profile.title: Edit Profile
profile.login_continue: Log into the app to continue

terms.agree: I agree to terms and conditions

messages.permission: Allow camera and microphone permission  to access this page.
messages.safari: Use latest Safari browser to access this page
messages.processing: Video is still processing, try after sometime
messages.processing_prompt: Your file is processing. Do not close this window. It will take a few seconds
messages.server_prompt: The video is taking a little longer to process than usual. Our servers are crunching bits as fast as it can to get the video ready for you ASAP.
messages.mac_browser: Use latest Safari browser to access this page
messages.api_error: Something went wrong,please try again later
messages.android_browser: Your browser version does not support CoVideo. To record a video, please update Chrome on your device.
messages.safari_browser: Your Safari browser version does not support CoVideo. To record a video, please update Safari on your device.
